#include <iostream>
#include <list>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int int64;

int m2 (int i) {return (i+30000) % 2;}

void incrt (int64 t[2][2], int x, int y, int64 s) {
  t[m2 (x)][m2 (y)] = t[m2 (x)][m2 (y)] + s;}

void incrt2 (int64 t[2], int x, int64 s) {
  t[m2 (x)] = t[m2 (x)] + s;}

void print_t (int64 t[][2]){
  cout << "00 " << t[0][0] << " 01 " << t[0][1] <<
    " 10 " << t[1][0] << " 11 " << t[1][1] << endl;}

int64 solve () {
  int n; scanf("%d",&n);
  int64 a [2][2]; int64 b [2][2]; int64 c [2][2]; int64 d [2][2];
  int64 ac [2][2]; int64 bd [2][2];
  int64 rep [] = {0, 0}; 
  int i,j,k,l;
  for (i=0; i<2; i++){
    for (j=0; j<2; j++){
      a[i][j]=0; b[i][j]=0; c[i][j]=0; d[i][j]=0; ac[i][j]=0; bd[i][j]=0;}
  }
  //lecture des donnÃ©es  
  int x,y;
  for (i=1;i <= n;i++){
    scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
    //cout << "x=" << x << " y=" << y << endl;
    if (x > 0 & y > 0) {incrt (a, x, y, 1);} 
    if (x > 0 & y < 0) {incrt (b, x, y, 1);} 
    if (x < 0 & y < 0) {incrt (c, x, y, 1);} 
    if (x < 0 & y > 0) {incrt (d, x, y, 1);} 
  }
  //print_t (a); print_t (b); print_t (c); print_t (d);
  for (i=0; i<2; i++){
    for (j=0; j<2; j++){
      for (k=0; k<2; k++){
	for (l=0; l<2; l++){
	  incrt (ac, i+k, j+l, a[i][j] * c[k][l]);}}}}
  for (i=0; i<2; i++){
    for (j=0; j<2; j++){
      for (k=0; k<2; k++){
	for (l=0; l<2; l++){
	  incrt (bd, i+k, j+l, b[i][j] * d[k][l]);}}}}
  //print_t (ac); print_t (bd);
  for (i=0; i<2; i++){
    for (j=0; j<2; j++){
      for (k=0; k<2; k++){
	for (l=0; l<2; l++){
	  incrt2 (rep, (i*l + j*k), ac[i][j] * bd[k][l]);}}}}
  return rep[0];
}

int main () {
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  //cout << "t=" << t << endl;
  for (int i=1; i<=t; i++){
  cout << solve () << endl;
  }
 return 0;
}
